mapper.insert: insert into tab_pb_msg_up_info (id, up_type, up_dept_id, up_dept_name, up_user_id, up_username, recevie_dept_id, recevie_dept_name, recevie_user_id, recevie_username, title, up_time, title_label, del_flag, create_time, create_userid, create_username, update_time, update_userid, update_username, content ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{upType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upDeptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{upDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{upUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recevieDeptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recevieDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{recevieUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{recevieUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{titleLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} )

mapper.update:
update tab_pb_msg_up_info
up_type = #{upType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_dept_id = #{upDeptId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
up_dept_name = #{upDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_user_id = #{upUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
up_username = #{upUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recevie_dept_id = #{recevieDeptId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
recevie_dept_name = #{recevieDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
recevie_user_id = #{recevieUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
recevie_username = #{recevieUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
up_time = #{upTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
title_label = #{titleLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
audit_dept_id = #{auditDeptId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
audit_dept_name = #{auditDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_user_id = #{auditUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
audit_username = #{auditUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_time = #{auditTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
audit_comment = #{auditComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
audit_assess = #{auditAssess,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tab_pb_msg_up_info set up_type = #{upType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_dept_id = #{upDeptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, up_dept_name = #{upDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_user_id = #{upUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, up_username = #{upUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recevie_dept_id = #{recevieDeptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, recevie_dept_name = #{recevieDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recevie_user_id = #{recevieUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, recevie_username = #{recevieUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},3 up_time = #{upTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, title_label = #{titleLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update tab_pb_msg_up_info set up_type = #{upType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_dept_id = #{upDeptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, up_dept_name = #{upDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_user_id = #{upUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, up_username = #{upUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recevie_dept_id = #{recevieDeptId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, recevie_dept_name = #{recevieDeptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, recevie_user_id = #{recevieUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, recevie_username = #{recevieUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, up_time = #{upTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, title_label = #{titleLabel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, del_flag = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_userid = #{createUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_username = #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_userid = #{updateUserid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_username = #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select u.user_id, u.realname as username from tab_pb_spcial_worker t LEFT JOIN sys_user u on u.user_id=t.user_id where t.del_flag = 0 and u.del_flag=0 and manage_org_id =#{deptId} and IFNULL(t.left_time,now()) >=now() ORDER BY arrive_time DESC limit 1

SELECT mup.id, mup.up_type, mup.up_dept_id, mup.up_dept_name, mup.up_user_id, mup.up_username, mup.recevie_dept_id, mup.recevie_dept_name, mup.recevie_user_id, mup.recevie_username, mup.title, mup.up_time, mup.title_label, mup.content, mup.audit_dept_id, mup.audit_user_id, mup.audit_time, mup.audit_comment, mup.audit_assess, mup.audit_dept_name, mup.audit_username, mup.real_dept_id, mup.real_dept_name, ifnull(t.video_num, 0) videoNum, ifnull(t.img_num, 0) imgNum, ifnull(t.doc_num, 0) docNum FROM tab_pb_msg_up_info mup LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on d.dept_id=mup.real_dept_id LEFT JOIN view_attachment_count t on mup.id = t.host_id and t.attachment_type = 40
mup.del_flag = 0
and mup.up_time between #{upTime} and #{upTimeOver}
and
find_in_set(${item}, mup.title_label)
AND (d.dept_id = #{rangeDeptId} OR d.parent_id = #{rangeDeptId})
AND find_in_set(#{rangeDeptId}, d.full_path)
AND d.dept_id = #{rangeDeptId}
order by mup.id desc
SELECT '40' as attachment_type, mup.* FROM tab_pb_msg_up_info mup WHERE mup.id = #{id} AND mup.del_flag = 0

select (select parent_id from sys_dept d where dept_id=#{deptId} and d.del_flag=0) recevie_dept_id , (select name from sys_dept d where dept_id = recevie_dept_id ) recevie_dept_name , (select user_id from tab_pb_spcial_worker where manage_org_id=recevie_dept_id and tab_pb_spcial_worker.del_flag=0 and IFNULL(left_time,now())>=now() ORDER BY arrive_time DESC ) recevie_user_id, (select realname from sys_user where user_id=recevie_user_id ) recevie_username from dual
